text: An NF-kappaB / Rel binding site within the <extra_id_0> GM-CSF <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> promoter , termed the kappaB element appears to be important for controlling expression in reporter gene assays in response to a number of stimuli in T cells .

text: A 15-base oligonucleotide , GM3 , was targeted to a purine-rich region in the <extra_id_0> GM-CSF <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> proximal promoter , which overlaps the kappaB element .
